text: Psydrax ficiformis is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to southern India. ==External links== *World Checklist of Rubiaceae *World Conservation Monitoring Centre. 1998. Psydrax ficiformis. The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species 1998. title: Psydrax ficiformis
